author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [PSReadLine](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine) from 2.0.0-beta3 to 2.0.0-beta4.
Release notes *Sourced from [PSReadLine's releases](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/releases).* > ## PSReadLine - Latest > The tag/release is the latest stable build.
Commits - [`33c2291`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/33c22915e9d45439ff4a787cc458f140d04090d0) Enable Azure DevOps release build ([#912](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/912)) - [`7050b12`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/7050b12edfc89e716bbf4364dd60bb2f0f4d2d01) 2.0.0-beta4 release preparation ([#905](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/905)) - [`e64acec`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/e64aceccddf7bf2fbbac902418875f9d36bc58de) Make sure to generate the 'OnIdle' event when there are other subscribers ([#899](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/899)) - [`c197e7e`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/c197e7e9b2e681a190d3ce24ebf46f5159e9d835) Fix 'Shift+Backspace/Escape' to work the same as 'Backspace/Escape' on Window... - [`546dc19`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/546dc199f881cc01e4fa399c01ee856f4dc77906) Fix incorrect links to documentation files. ([#894](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/894)) - [`ef2f65f`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/ef2f65f4aeb27e3a1e9978bc946ac6f2347f9451) Fix the regression to make long lines work properly at the end of screen buff... - [`fdd38b9`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/fdd38b976127212b6508ce24d591f7cd6d879d2c) Rename 'TestPSReadLine' to 'MockPSConsole' ([#890](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/890)) - [`8454358`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/8454358ec4b432b63897b6f14338d9bc8316bf2b) Refactor the build scripts and AppVeyor CI ([#888](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/888)) - [`3a97b70`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/3a97b701d748334045d67bd736b4a463b7888568) Fixed some unit-tests that were relying on an implicit definition of "_" at t... - [`905ab44`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/905ab44ee3404c351e34f61334c5eddc8d65d9ab) ensure text files use crlf line endings ([#872](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/872)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/compare/v2.0.0-beta3...v2.0.0-beta4)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta3&new-version=2.0.0-beta4)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta3&new-version=2.0.0-beta4) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump PSReadLine from 2.0.0-beta3 to 2.0.0-beta4 in /src/Modules
